selected_quotes: #HealthCitizenship can help shape #clinicaltrial design to address questions of greatest importance to #patients
.@MargaretAinDC explores how health IT, #data sharing more can shape #HealthCitizenship
It's time to create a revolution in clinical trials #healthcitizenship
#HealthCitizenship involves breaking down barriers to patient participation in #clinicaltrials.
#HealthCitizenship can provide a platform for individuals to engage with #researchers, #industry #regulators.

citation.abstract: The health citizenship movement can provide a platform for citizens-healthy and ill-to engage with researchers, industry, and regulators.
citation.publisher: American Association for the Advancement of Science
citation.title: Rx for Innovation: A path forward for us all
